Shareholder Name: Arab Company for Drug Industries and Medical Appliances - Jordan

Description: Saudi Pharmaceutical Industries and Medical Appliances Corp (known as: SPIMACO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 1993. SPIMACO operates within the Pharmaceuticals, Biotechnology and Life Sciences sector focusing on Pharmaceuticals. It has Companies operating across British Islands, Northern Africa and Middle East. SPIMACO is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1986.
Company Name: Saudi Pharmaceutical Industries and Medical Appliances Corp (2070)
